title: If Swain uses Zhonya's his ult should turn off.
body: It's bull that he can heal and damage you, while you cannot touch him, nerf please.

Swain's ult is a toggle, it's like Anvia's, if Anivia Zhonya's her ult turns off. it's not the fact that he heals, it's the fact that it nullifies counterplay against Swain, he already is impossible to duel unless you have ignite or two friends, even more when he walks in the middle ults and then Zhonya's and heals back to full HP unless your team scatters from him. He gets two seconds of free heal and damage, toggle abilities should toggle off when Zhonya's is used.
Anyone in Zhonyas mode shouldn't be able to heal themselves, because they should be completely un-interactable.
